title:
From Black Box to Clarity: AI-Powered Smart Grid Optimization with
  Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks
authors: Xiaoting Wang, Yuzhuo Li, Yunwei Li, and Gregory Kish
abstract:
This work is the first to adopt Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (KAN), a recent
breakthrough in artificial intelligence, for smart grid optimizations. To fully
leverage KAN's interpretability, a general framework is proposed considering
complex uncertainties. The stochastic optimal power flow problem in hybrid
AC/DC systems is chosen as a particularly tough case study for demonstrating
the effectiveness of this framework.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Systems and Control
